name: Ball Jumper 3D
description:
Ball Jumper 3D - is a new arcade game that allow you use various balls having gravity to make if fall freely and to score as you fall down crossing helix tower obstacles in the free space.

Ball Jumper 3D simulates a labyrinth space with the ball jumping through the twists that are attached with different color traps.

Your task is to control the ball jumping deeper into the Spiral maze below the tower.

Jumping is a classic and wonderful jumping game. These balls will help you remember your childhood. The helix ball jump will let your brain's rest and entertainment.
Simple controls just slide the fingers right and left for the helix rotation and jump of the ball. Try to avoid the odd color spots helix and let the ball pass. 
You have to avoid the color obstacles to keep moving, if you fail you will have to play again from the beginning.
The jumps ball game around 3d spiral helix tower is a amazing bouncing spring game using the free fall of jumping ball.

HOW TO PLAY:

Playing Ball Jumper 3D is simple. Put a finger on the screen and just slide the fingers to left and right to rotate the helix tower.
Rotate the platforms so the ball falls through the open area. It can bounce on the platforms, but you cannot bounce on the odd color platforms.
You can score more points by going through multiple open area at once. Go through three or more platforms, and then it will break the next platform.
Collect all the diamonds in your jumping and unlock more colorful balls!

Jump ball and go forever on the Helix maze and Helix Bounce Ball. Master your skill on sliding and jumping.

Enjoy your time playing Ball Jumper 3D and unlock all colorful balls to get the best experience you can get in this new addictive game.

Features:
- smooth and convenient control
- unique 3d game mechanics
- bouncing ball can have different skins
- suitable for both children and adults
- simple gameplay, you just need to turn the ball
